I think I've done a better job over the last season of knowing when to get out and when to hang in there. Jan 27. http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight_Howard_Orlando_Magic_04/05 Three-time scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. ''You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''

web searches. His vision is nothing less than the etiolation of free will by, and the surrender of individual autonomy to, the all-knowing, all-seeing priestly class at Google Inc. . In the future, says Eric Schmidt , one idea is that more and more searches are done on your behalf without you needing to type. There is, of course, a very fine line between on your behalf and without your knowledge or approval. Just as fine is the line between without you needing to type and without you needing to think or

OUT: NO SALES: NO ARCHIVE: Andy Coulson denies any knowledge of the hacking, but admitted he'd committed a cardinal sin for a back room operator- he became the story. Andy Coulson said continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in his role as Downing Street communications chief. ''I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on.''

in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
